snippet: A man with no apparent motive, armed with semiautomatic pistols and a semiautomatic rifle, fatally shot 26 people inside a Newtown elementary school before taking his own life.
abstract: Gunman identified as 20-year-old Adam Lanza kills 26 people, 20 of them young children, in a rampage at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, before taking his own life; Lanza is also believed to have killed his mother Nancy at their home earlier in the day; police have yet to determine a motive for the brutally efficient massacre, which has set off a tide of anguish nationwide.

Ray Rivera, Liz Robbins,
Emily S. Rueb, Eric
Schmitt, Michael Schwirtz,
Kirk Semple, Wendy Ruderman,
Jonathan Weisman,
Vivian Yee and Kate Zernike.

lead_paragraph: A man with no apparent motive, armed with semiautomatic pistols and a semiautomatic rifle, fatally shot 26 people inside a Newtown elementary school before taking his own life.

headline.main: Nation Reels After Gunman Massacres 20 Children at School in Connecticut
headline.print_headline: Gunman Massacres 20 Children at School in Connecticut; 28 Dead, Including Killer
headline.sub: Motive for Gunman’s Actions Remains Unknown
